## Functions

### getBlockName() {#a01e9ac225b83bb4ded4adbba7d360cbe}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class BlockT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>std::string llvm::bfi&#95;detail::getBlockName (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> BlockT &#42; BB)</>}>
Get the name of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>.

Get the name of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>. It&#39;s templated so that including from CodeGen is unnecessary (that would be a layering issue).

This is used mainly for debug output. The name is similar to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad2a8da74fd4e4c892018c56c977addee">MachineBasicBlock::getFullName()</a>, but skips the name of the function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h/#l00572">572</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
